member.name: T:Amazon.WorkMailMessageFlow.AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing WorkMailMessageFlow
The WorkMail Message Flow API provides access to email messages as they are being sent and received by a WorkMail organization.

member.name: M:Amazon.WorkMailMessageFlow.AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.WorkMailMessageFlow.AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.summary:
Constructs AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.WorkMailMessageFlow.AmazonWorkMailMessageFlowClient.GetRawMessageContentAsync(Amazon.WorkMailMessageFlow.Model.GetRawMessageContentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves the raw content of an in-transit email message, in MIME format.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the GetRawMessageContent service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the GetRawMessageContent service method, as returned by WorkMailMessageFlow.
member.exception: The requested email message is not found.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for GetRawMessageContent Operation
